description: Stores information about Premium Billing accounts.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the premium billing account.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
columns.description: Name for the premium billing account.

columns.name: PBA_REC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Displays the status of the premium billing account record (i.e. active or deleted).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: EXT_IDENT
columns.description: External ID for the premium billing account.

columns.name: PB_FORMAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the premium billing invoice format that is used when printing premium billing invoices for the premium billing account.

columns.name: PB_FORMAT_ID_FORMAT_NAME
columns.description: Name of the premium billing invoice format

columns.name: DELINQUENCY_DATE
columns.description: Date the premium billing account was last delinquent.

columns.name: DELINQUENT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Delinquency status of the premium billing account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Delinquent

columns.name: DELINQ_PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the last invoice for which the premium billing account was delinquent.

columns.name: POST_PMT_ON_INV_YN
columns.description:
This Yes/No flag indicates whether payments should automatically be posted to the premium billing account when the premium billing account is invoiced.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PBA_REC_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: INDIVIDUAL_BILL_YN
columns.description:
This Yes/No flag indicates whether this account is an individual billing account.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PBA_REC_STAT_C_NAME

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The extract date and time of the record for this table.

columns.name: OWNING_BUSSEG_ID
columns.description: Stores the business segment ID that owns the premium billing account record.

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether auto pay is currently active for this account. Y is stored if it is active, N otherwise.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_CARD_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the payment card currently being used for auto pay.

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_PAYMENT_DAY
columns.description: Stores the day of the month auto pay is currently scheduled to occur on.

columns.name: AUTO_PAY_NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the next date auto pay is currently scheduled to occur on.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_SUBSCRIBER_PAT_ID
columns.description: Stores the original subscriber that an individual account was created for.

columns.name: BUCKET_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The account status represents the overall state of an account. This is composite of the premium bucket statuses for the buckets on an account. An account with a status of "New" does not have any transactions filed to it. An account with a status of "Open - Unreconciled" as at least one bucket that has a status of "Open - Unreconciled". An account with the status of "Open - Reconciled" has been fully reconciled and contains transactions that have not been invoiced. An account with a status of "Closed" has all buckets reconciled and invoiced. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Open - Unreconciled


Open - Reconciled


Closed
